query: What is the return policy for laptops?
retrieved_contexts: You can return any electronic item within 30 days of purchase. The item must be in original packaging.
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the return.
ground_truth_contexts: Electronics can be returned within 30 days in original packaging.
response: You can return laptops within 30 days if they are in their original packaging.

retrieved_contexts: Free standard shipping is available on all orders over $50.
Expedited shipping costs $15 regardless of order size.
response: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on orders over $50.

query: How do I reset my password?
retrieved_contexts: To reset your password, go to Settings > Security and click 'Change Password'.
If you forgot your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the email instructions.
response: You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
